category: Things that Generate or Emit Their Own Light
explanation: Candle, Firefly, Sun, and Star all produce or emit their own light. A mirror, however, only reflects light and does not generate it.

Four of these are among the original Seven Wonders of the Ancient World that no longer exist or are largely destroyed. The Great Pyramid of Giza is the only one of the original seven that still stands today.
Novel, Atlas, Textbook, and Manual are all common types of bound books. A Scroll is an ancient form of document typically rolled, not bound with pages.
